Where to get healing mushrooms?
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher DS Archive (DS): Japanese DS Games Archive: Monster Farm DS: Misc. Q&A (post all new topics here, we'll make more sections later): Where to get healing mushrooms?
By Mitsuki the Ninja on Friday, July 30, 2010 - 03:15 pm:

I've had the game since it first came out, and I managed to find the healing mushrooms before, but I quit playing for years and just started a new game, and I can't find the healing mushrooms anywhere.

If it helps, shortly after I got the quest, my highest ranked monster retired, because it took me a very long time to remember that I needed to go to Ryuwn in order to get more tournaments to show up. So, is that my problem? Do I have to be rank C to find the mushrooms?
